Breadth-First.Explanation: Divergent clue collection: lists sign text, possible exits and suburbs without a firm hypothesis
Reopens consideration of administrative naming and potential alternate tunnels before settling on neighborhood name

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifies specific Papagou tunnel hypothesis using motorway article details

Depth-First.Explanation: Performs in-depth analysis of signage conventions, motorway numbering, tunnel design, and road names to confirm location

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shifts from broad sign observation to detailed verification of the Papagou tunnel hypothesis
After confirming the tunnel, reopens exploration of naming conventions and alternative tunnel possibilities
Moves back into convergent mode to systematically analyze and cite multiple clue categories for final confirmation
